issue.title: [Java] upgrade error-prone library to 2.16.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current version of errorprone interacts badly with Intellij, leading to erroneous (ironically ) reporting of an error for using "non-standard ascii characters".

This causes intermittent but frequent failures of arbitrary tests and is thus crazy-making. 

See Errorprone issue <https://github.com/google/error-prone/issues/3092>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18044?focusedCommentId=17618359) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14423
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14423>
